name: Jump To The Milky Way
summary: In the game "Jump To The Milky Way" you will embark on an exciting journey through the vastness of space, jumping from platform to platform and exploring mysterious corners of the galaxy in search of portals to other worlds. Challenge gravity using the unique "space jump" technology and find portals to other worlds. Exciting space landscapes, unexpected obstacles, and incredible secrets await, which you can only uncover with your skills and ingenuity. Become a space traveler and discover new worlds in "Jump To The Milky Way"!
